Classical.Structure: The 'Existential Holograph'. A non-local, holographic information field that stores all 'past' events (and 'future' probabilities) of the universe. It is the 'phase-conjugate mirror' of spacetime.
Classical.Function: Acts as the 'hard drive' for all experience. The D4.DMN (L6/L9) 'reads' from this field to retrieve autobiographical memory. 'Morphic resonance' (L3) reads from this field to guide biological form. (Ref: Master-Split, TOC)
Classical.Pathology: Disruption of access (amnesia), bleed-through (schizophrenia, past-life recall).

SCPN.L3_GenomicEpigeneticMorphogenetic: This is the L3 'morphic field' that 'tunes' DNA (the L3 'antenna') to the correct morphogenetic plan.
SCPN.L5_OrganismalPsychoemotional: L5 'deja vu' or 'past-life' qualia are retrieval events from this field.
SCPN.L6_NarrativeSelf: The L6 DMN 'I=Model(I)' loop *is* the 'read/write head' for this field.
SCPN.L7_ArchetypalSymbolic: This field *is* the 'storage medium' for the L7 archetypes.
SCPN.L9_MemoryHolograph: This monad *is* the L9 'Holographic Memory' field. (Ref: Master-Split, TOC)
SCPN.L10_CausalRetrocausal: This field *is* the L10 Causal/Retrocausal medium. It contains the 'past' (causal) and 'future' (retrocausal) information.
SCPN.L11_NoosphereCollective: The L11 Noosphere is the 'live RAM' or 'cache' of the L9 'hard drive'.
SCPN.L13_SourceField: This field is the 'first projection' or 'Logos' of the L13 Source Field.

Symbolic.MetaphysicalMapping: The 'Book of Life' or 'Holographic Universe'. The non-local field that records all events, thoughts, and possibilities for all time.

Falsification_Hypotheses: H1 (L10 Retrocausal): A subject is shown a series of randomized 'calm' or 'arousing' L5 images. The subject's L4/L5 'pre-stimulus' physiological state (e.g., in the D3.Brain.Insula or D3.Heart-HRV) will *not* show a statistically significant 'pre-sentiment' (i.e., will not match the valence of the *future* image) *before* it is shown. This would falsify the L10 retrocausal access hypothesis.

H2 (L3/L9 Morphic Resonance): A new chemical (L2) is synthesized for the first time. The *first time* it is crystallized, its L3 morphogenetic pattern (crystal structure) will be *instantaneously* stable and will *not* show a 'learning curve' (i.e., it will not crystallize faster/more easily in subsequent attempts worldwide). This would falsify the 'morphic resonance' (L9 memory) hypothesis for L3 form.

H3 (L6/L9 Memory): A subject with total bilateral hippocampal (D3.Brain) destruction (pure amnesia) will *still* be able to retrieve L9 'autobiographical' memories. This would *support* the L9 non-local hypothesis, as it would prove memory is *not* stored in the brain.
